entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
